name: requirejs-babel7
description: An AMD module loader plugin for using RequireJS with Babel 7.
author: Ferdinand Prantl <prantlf@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: npm run generate && npm run optimize
scripts.generate: npm run create:helpers && npm run create:polyfills && npm run minify:helpers && npm run minify:polyfills && npm run minify:requirejs
scripts.minify:helpers: terser -cm --comments false --source-map includeSources --source-map url=babel-helpers.min.js.map -o demo-polyfill/babel-helpers.min.js demo-polyfill/babel-helpers.js
scripts.minify:polyfills: terser -cm --comments false --source-map includeSources --source-map url=babel-polyfills.min.js.map --source-map content=demo-polyfill/babel-polyfills.js.map -o demo-polyfill/babel-polyfills.min.js demo-polyfill/babel-polyfills.js
scripts.minify:requirejs: terser -cm --comments false --source-map includeSources --source-map url=require.min.js.map -o demo-polyfill/require.min.js node_modules/requirejs/require.js
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:demo && npm run optimize:demo-polyfill
